resources.string:
Thanks for signing up with Coquito! 
 We sent a confirmation message to your email. 
 Chefs: once you confirm your email, we can talk about getting you verified. 
 Get ready to turn your passion into profession!

Hi! Thanks for the response. I am available for pickup any time today. My address is 3456 Tenessee Street.
